dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle uncertainty?

options.description: Your FarTwin will carefully weigh options and avoid taking unnecessary risks.
Your FarTwin will be open to new experiences and willing to take calculated risks.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin show emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will express their emotions freely, without hesitation or reserve.
Your FarTwin will keep their emotions private and only share them with close confidants.

dimensions.label: Decision-Making Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will base their decisions on facts and evidence, without emotional influence.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and make decisions based on gut feelings or hunches.

dimensions.label: Confidence Level
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be self-assured and take the lead in new situations, with a strong sense of determination.
Your FarTwin will approach new challenges with caution, seeking guidance or support before taking action.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be sociable and enjoy meeting new people, engaging in lively conversations, and taking center stage.
Your FarTwin will prefer quieter settings and may take time to warm up to new people or situations, but will still value meaningful connections.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin tackle problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will methodically break down complex problems into manageable parts, analyzing data and evidence to find solutions.
Your FarTwin will approach problems with a flexible mindset, generating innovative ideas and thinking outside the box.

dimensions.label: Impulsivity Level
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin act on impulse?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be prone to acting without thinking, following their emotions and instincts in the moment.
Your FarTwin will take time to consider options and weigh the consequences before acting, avoiding impulsive decisions.

dimensions.label: Risk of Rebellion
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle authority?

options.description: Your FarTwin will respect authority and follow rules, even if it means sacrificing personal desires or autonomy.
Your FarTwin will challenge authority and question established norms, seeking to create change and push boundaries.
